18236939.admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

repnme.cdata!:
Yemen Arab Republic - Livestock Credit and
            Processing Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would include: (a) the
            formation of a national Livestock Development Corporation
            (LDC) as a semi-autonomous, Government-owned commercial
            enterprise. LDC would establish about eight 50-cow dairy
            farms, a livestock fattening farm, a poultry unit and feed
            mill; (b) the construction and development of three urban
            slaughterhouses and about 154 municipal retail market stalls
            to be operated by the Ministry of Municipalities. Hides and
            skins improvement would be included, as well as meat
            inspection services; (c) the support of animal health
            services of the Directorate of Animal Health of the Ministry
            of Agriculture through disease control and diagnostic
            services, veterinary field stations, and quarantine
            facilities at Hodeida; (d) the provision of supervised
            credit through ACF to about 900 traditional sector
            landowners, small holder livestock and poultry owners, and
            irrigated fodder crop producers; (e) the establishment of a
            livestock and range improvement center in the Intermontane
            plain area.

Yemen Arab Republic - Livestock Credit and
